net.sf.oereader

Class OEMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.oereader.OEBase
      • net.sf.oereader.OEMessage

  • public class OEMessage
extends OEBase
    Class representing a message in a .dbx file. Loaded by the MessageInfo constructor.

        i - index to start from
